Greetings, I'm Toam Cohen,

a Passionate Full Stack Developer Based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

  • Get to Know Me

Journey into Code

Hello, I'm Toam, and my journey into the world of coding began at the age of 20. A problem solver at heart, I quickly became a hardworking and game-changing force in any company I'm part of. With a relentless drive and energy, I am deeply passionate about developing for the web, mobile, desktop, or any platform. My knowledge is rooted in real-life case scenarios, and in the past year alone, I've successfully built over 7 real life projects for different customers.

  • Next Slide

Teaching Experience

As a former web development teacher at AppelSeeds Israel, I had the privilege of sharing my knowledge and insights with aspiring students, contributing to the growth of the tech community.

  • Next Slide

Goals in Life

My overarching goal in life is to give my best every day, whether it's in my work, family, friendships, or personal endeavors. I firmly believe that excellence in every aspect of life is more than enough to lead a fulfilling and meaningful existence.

  • Next Slide

Human Skills

Beyond code, I bring a positive and helpful demeanor to every team. I thrive on challenges and eagerly volunteer for tasks that push me beyond my comfort zone. Problem-solving is not just a skill for me it's the backbone of my thoughts. With a solid command of English, I ensure seamless communication in any work environment.

Skills Snapshot

I excel in asynchronous code, possess a good understanding of algorithms and data structures, and believe in continuous growth. My technical toolbox is well-equipped, covering MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Node.js, React, Vue, and AWS. I am experienced in deploying EC2 instances, utilizing Redis, RabbitMQ, S3, and more within the AWS environment.
